quoteText:
We use auto-renewal for many of our fee-based Services.
At the expiration of each subscription term for such fee-based Services, we will automatically renew your subscription and charge the credit card or other payment method you have provided to us, unless you cancel your subscription at least 48 hours before the end of the current period.
title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

tosdr.case: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
